Medium: 15 transfer lithographs, printed in black, 10 with pochoir additions, on cream, smooth, wove Lana paper; supplementary suite, printed in black (without pochoir additions) on ivory, smooth, laid China paper; and 1 added duplicate transfer lithograph, printed in black on cream, smooth, wove Lana paper
Dimensions: irreg. page  12 15/16 x 9 13/16" (33 x 25 cm)  Prints:  various dimensions.
Title: LES ILLUMINATIONS
